title: Three Hard Lessons
description: I am the woman men pay thousands of dollars to sleep with. I do what I love and what I'm so very good at.Then he walks in and drops $30,000. He wants to talk. And kiss. And take me home.In a single night, this man turns everything upside-down and has me breaking every rule I've lived by to keep men at a distance. I'm about to learn some lessons the hard way.Don't tease him. Don't give him boundaries. And don't think you get a choice in who you love.
author: Nikki Sloane
